nodes.text: The Nord system was a star system that was located within the Kanz sector, in the Outer Rim Territories and New Territories regions of the galaxy. The bounty hunter known as Iceman, who operated in the Minos Cluster shortly after the Battle of Yavin, hailed from the Nord system.

The Nord system was first mentioned in the 1990 sourcebook Galaxy Guide 6: Tramp Freighters, which was written by Mark Rein-Hagen and Stewart Wieck for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the system in grid square N-4.
